website_summaries.verdict: Add depth and shine to your eyes, cheeks, and lips with this unique holographic palette.
pros: Tinted, luminous shades designed to be worn on top of eyeshadow, blush, or lipstick
Colors add another dimension to flat black eyeshadows and matte lips
Shimmers and slightly changes color in the light
cons: Shallow pans mean there's not a lot of product in this palette

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors that match every piece in my wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this eyeshadow palette around the holidays at Sephora. I took one look at the line there .... snapped a shot of this palette with my phone, and out the door I went! Later that day, I surfed up to Amazon.com and bought it. I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE the gorgeous, iridescent shades here, which match every single piece of clothing I own. The shades are like a shimmering (not glittery, overdone or tacky) green, purple, peach and blue. OWIE gorgeous. Of course the colors will look different on various skin tones, and I happen to be SUPER fair. Even so, I think these colors would look great on darker skin, too - more dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: *1Mumtaz*

customer_reviews.title: My favorite highlighter to date
customer_reviews.text: This continues to be my favorite highlighter palette no matter what I try. It blows everything else out of the water. The formula is so comfortable, the pigments are gorgeous, and it has staying power. Doesn’t fall or sweat off, doesn’t get dry or flaky in the winter. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: amberlily

customer_reviews.title: Great pallette, but one was broken upon opening.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pallette itself and it's definitely cheaper here than it was anywhere else at the time I purchased it. BUT, when it arrived, one of the colors was destroyed, totally broken up and unusable upon opening. The others were fine. It was only the one but it made a pretty big mess and I'll never be able to use that color.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pallet but a little expensive. Its cheaper at Saphora!
customer_reviews.author: They, Them

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging and colors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the colors very much, but some of the eyeshadow colors almost broke because not packaged properly, with makeup ( especially eyeshadow) it should have a lot of bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use it more for highlighter then I do eye shadow but it’s sooooo pretty as either one.
customer_reviews.author: jamie carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that I received I fake after looking forward to it for so long. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Morley

customer_reviews.title: Came broken - reordered same shadow broken again..
customer_reviews.text: Came broken twice.. love the colors the packaging but unfortunately my favorite color in the pallet is the broken one - which is the one that comes crushed :( I now see other reviews showing same shadow coming crushed...
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The amythest color is ultra violet and honestllyyyy wowwww (that picture is only of the amythest)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it none was broken colore work very well show clearly!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m POPPIN
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, everything I dreamed of and more. Sun a fun addition to any look. Can’t wait to break it out for raves and festivals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It had arrived on time, and the colors are beautiful. But the product was broken and I had to fix it myself. The blue sapphire was all cracked and broken all over
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Sprang

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is every palette I bought came in with a different color broken. I love the eye shadow though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mako

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful. I use it everyday. My friend fell in love with it too and bought themselves their own
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ball

customer_reviews.title: Awesome selection of colors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome selection of colors! Love that it's not heavy with color. It's just right for highlighting with a touch of rainbowy shimmer
customer_reviews.author: FruitsnVegies

customer_reviews.title: Erhmmm......🙄
customer_reviews.text: When I received it two of the four colors were broken. Luckily I know to fix that. But great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Abigale Slade

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing palette. Thinking about getting another in case it gets discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia French

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, and I knew exactly what I was buying. It's great quality as any other KVD product is, and it's GORGEOUS. It's not glittery, it's shimmery and holo. To the reviews being commented on with complaints re: where they're stating the high price: *It is too high*. The price was/is that high because it temporarily sold out. Sephora just got the palettes restocked, and they probably aren't going to last long. People do this gross buy/resell at a higher price because it's hard to find all the time, and greedy people know they can cash in on it. There's no need to bash people for complaining about it - it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: jessica leigh

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best highlight palette I’ve ever had. I knew it would be too but it has just blown me away and I want 20 more 😂
customer_reviews.author: Kat Quisenberry

customer_reviews.title: It was on time with no issues...
customer_reviews.text: The gift was for my daughter, who was extremely happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product broke in less than a month. Cheaply made makeup
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Costabile

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I love the colours in this. Product is great. But it came smashed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wilk

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: It's really different, I'm so happy I bought it. Not something I wear every day but it's fun for those special moments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything Kat Von D. The shipping took forever, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Just what I wanted. I cried tears of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being way expensive for my tastes (I've never been one to splurge on pricey, "high quality" makeup brands) I decided to treat myself to this Kat Von D Alchemist Holographic Palette, and I'm definitely obsessed. It's super pigmented and goes on smoothly (I say, trying to sound like I know anything about makeup), and it's not only perfect as a highlighter, but it works for eyeshadow and lips, too, if you're looking to do a little something different with your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Deena E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was going to return it but decided to keep it. It is very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Soooo disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and was so excited until I saw it wasn't sealed and the powder was damaged. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaRoxanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal even if it is over priced
customer_reviews.author: Madison EasleySmith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Over priced here but it's legit and beautiful as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce BishopTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received the item and opened it up and all the product dumped onto my lap in pieces. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Was my favorite color too
customer_reviews.text: The product would have been okay but unfortunately part of the palette came broken and the crumbled product was a huge holographic mess! Was my favorite color too. I would return it but unfortunately need the product this weekend. Super disappointing. I would order from Sephora or better yet go to a store and pick one up to avoid this messy disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: HM-J

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: We don’t know yet. A Christmas gift that my daughter just received, and two of the four colors were completely destroyed. She’s trying to re-press it so it’s useable but it’s not looking good. #giftfail
customer_reviews.author: Margi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty eye shadow but arrived damaged so I returned it & found it cheaper somewhere else. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: The BEST eyeshadow!
customer_reviews.text: Very wonderful eyeshadow! I love the shimmer so much that I bought one for my girlfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Holloman

customer_reviews.title: Very Unique
customer_reviews.text: Very uniquely gorgeous shades with a smooth formula that work well on their own and add a unique look when added to shadows you already own! Unlike the other reviewer I had no adverse reaction, and I have sensitive skin. I would grab this palette fast as it is limited edition and I haven't seen anything else like it!
customer_reviews.author: Beautylover

customer_reviews.title: Holographic Dreams <3
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. Finally got it today and the colors show up just like the picture! You can also put it on top of brown/black/whatever other color eyeshadows to get a variety of shades. It's a great highlighter, just remember a little goes a long way. So pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, so fun. It lasts a long time and is very blendable. However buy it at Sephora, or Sephora.com only $32 there. This price is a blatant rip off. All of Kat's cosmetics (and all cosmetics that are not Chinese knockoffs for that matter) are extremely price bloated on amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Aukert

customer_reviews.title: Best Highlighter Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this palette, the colors are gorgeous! They’re very pigmented and last all day. They make beautiful eyeshadows as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ciffone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent birthday gift-high quakity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for someone who loves makeup. It was a hit! This palette has a beautiful range of colors and is sheer enough that it can be worn everyday. I love the fact that it’s ethical makeup and the Kat Von D collection has a great reputation. Now I have to buy a palette for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Youtuber
customer_reviews.text: Hello I'm Desiree Davis I'm 23 years old and I'm a youtuber I was very interested in doing a review on my channel for this Kat Von D Holographic pallete
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pallet. Omg multi uses/multi functional... thanks kat von d
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but reactive...
customer_reviews.text: Despite my girlfriend's adoration for the holographic pallette, she had swatched it and it had an adverse effect. She tested it on the back of her hand, but complained that her hand was itchy. It very quickly turned red and raised like a rash. It came off with some alcohol and made the redness go away, but it still itched for a time. She claimed that the pallette was beautiful, but the reaction made it so she refused to purchase it. She also added that Amazon has it listed for $70, whereas Sephora is selling it for half that.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Not actually holographic
customer_reviews.text: It's not actually a holographic palette and is simply just duo chromatic. Don't let them fool you as this is just a marketing ploy in order to get you to purchase the product.
customer_reviews.author: John D Broderick

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing though, no joke
customer_reviews.text: This palette is so gorgeous but you can get it for half the price at Sephora. It is amazing though, no joke, but there is not enough product in it to be worth $60+
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

product_meta.title: Kat Von D Alchemist Holographic Palette
product_meta.description: Revamp your makeup looks with this innovative, Alchemist Palette, featuring four holographic shades. It's perfect for achieving a spectrum of radiant, special effects by layering Alchemist over eyeshadow and lipstick. Formulated with Double Dimension Technology, this first-of-its-kind formula is packed with 360 degree refractive pearls, dipped in a prismatic coating, to deliver twice the transforming power. Each of the four shades within the palette catches the light from every angle for a spectrum of luminizing special effects, perfect for customizing finishes and exploring your artistic expression.
feature_bullets: Kat Von D Alchemist Holographic Palette
Eye light, face bright—highlight EVERYTHING with the new Alchemist Holographic Palette.
four magical prismatic shades, which you can wear solo or layer to your heart’s content.
Palette contains 4 Holographic Shades; Emerald, Saphire, Amethyst and Opal
